Hi Nicole! I’ve been watching your videos for at least 9 years. 😻 I am using the same camera to vlog and I feel obligated to tell you to turn ON the stabilization! 😅 I have ruined so many vlogs before I realized that when the Product showcase is On the stabilization automatically turns off. 😿 Just keep it in mind, it looks so much better when you’re not using a tripod.
Love,
Valerie
